projects.title: Rental Bravo
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a SPA to connect property owners and managers with tenants seeking to rent a property.
 -  Built Front-End UI by utilizing ReactJs, React-Bootstrap and leveraged Node.JS, Express, and RESTful routes to perform CRUD functionality and routing on Back-End. 
 - Utilized JWT authentication and consumed RESTful APIs such as MapBox forward geocoding API to auto-load addresses when adding or searching for the listings. Also, utilized AWS S3Bucket for storing images.

projects.title: Django Shop
projects.bodyText:
- Developed an E-commerce web app for small retail stores to have an online presence and also, connect with new customers and handle online orders to generate more revenue and acquire customers.
 - Utilized HTML5 and CSS framework Materialize to develop the front-end UI and Python and Django framework to implement the business logic on the back-end. Also, I leveraged PostgreSQL to store Data.
 - Leveraged AWS S3Bucket for storing images on the web server and deployed the app on Heroku.

projects.title: YourAccommodation
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a web app to connect property owners and managers with tenants seeking to rent a property. 
 - Build Front-End UI by utilizing HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript templating engine(EJS) and leveraging Node.JS, Express, and RESTful routes to perform CRUD functionality and routing on Back-End. 
 -  Consumed RESTful APIs such as Google People API along with OAuth 2.0 to authenticate, authorize and allow user login, and also, used Imgur API for image uploading.

projects.title: BlackJack
projects.bodyText:
- Developed browser based, most popular, and widely played casino banking game BlackJack. 
 - Utilized HTML5, CSS3 to build user-friendly UI and implemented real game rules by leveraging JavaScript. Also, implemented Model-View-Controller(MVC) to navigate through the gameplay and render game rules. 
 - Leveraged wire-framing tool Figma and Trello board to prepare wire-frames and manage project tasks.
